attributes.action: BAN THE RETURN OF STANDING TERRICES IN FOOTBALL GROUNDS
attributes.additional_details: MPS ARE TRYING TO PUT A BILL THROUGH PARLIMENT TO ALLOW TOP LEVEL FOOTBALL CLUBS TO BRING BACK STANDING TERRICES, THIS IS AVERY DANGEROUS MOVE ,SINCE THE TAYLOR REPORT FTER THE HILSBOROUGH DISASTER ALL SEATER STADIUMS WERE INTRODUCED WE MUST KEEP THEM THAT WAY ,NO LIVES HAVE BEEN LOST SINCE THAT INTRODUCTION LETS KEEP IT THAT WAY !!!
